review: I bought this item along with a sling tv subscription. Sling TV is horrible. It pauses and "catches up" causing you to miss some of the programming you're watching (really sucks when you're watching sports). It is not a network bandwidth issue on my part because I can switch to netflix or hulu and have no problems at all. Avoid Sling TV ... Amazon Fire TV is ok, but expensive for what it is. I like the bluetooth audio capability and I like the voice recognition remote.
